tables.comment:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_comment` (
  `comment_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `poster_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `parent_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `parent_user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `about_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `about_type` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `poster_type` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `parent_type` varchar(32) NOT NULL,
  `like_count` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `content` text NOT NULL,
  `created_at` datetime NOT NULL,
  `attachment_type` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `attachment_id` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`comment_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
